name: Dandemonium
description:
Dandemonium is being developed for STL Arcade Jam 2018.

Controls are:

Player 1: Arrow keys to move. Period [.]  to throw dirt and Forward Slash[/] to drop butterfly bombs

Player 2: WASD to move. Back tick [`] to throw dirt and 1 to drop butterfly bombs.

XBox Gamepad: Left Thumbstick to move. A to throw dirt and B to drop butterfly bonbs.
